original_text: One day, Jesus was teaching people in the yard of the temple. He was telling people the good news about God. Then the leaders of the priests and the teachers of God's Law came to him. With them were some other important Jews.
korean_text: 하루는 예수께서 성전에서 백성을 가르치시며 복음을 전하실새 대제사장들과 서기관들이 장로들과 함께 가까이 와서

sentences.original_text: One day, Jesus was teaching people
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 예수님은 사람들을 가르치고 계셨습니다

sentences.original_text: in the yard of the temple
He was telling people the good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 좋은 소식을 전하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then the leaders of the priests
and the teachers of God's Law
With them were some other important Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 다른 중요한 유대인들도 있었습니다
